FrageText.de: Wann dürfen Sie tagsüber das Fernlicht verwenden?
FrageText.en: When is it permitted to use the high beam during the day?
FrageText.hr: Kad smijete tijekom dana upotrijebiti dugo svjetlo?
FrageText.sl: Kdaj boste podnevi uporabljali dolge luči?
FrageText.tr: Gündüzleri ne zaman uzun farı kullanabilirsiniz?

en.Text: In order to flash one's headlights
